page.title: 04ABERDEEN: A DAY IN THE LIFE.
page.content:
ABERDEEN: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY MUM.
My Mum is called Irene. She is 33 and has two daughters. On Wednesday 19th June 1985 my Mum got up at 7.10a.m to go to work. She went downstairs to the kitchen to make coffee and have a glass of fruit juice. Then she shouted "Nicky it's time to get up." When I got dressed my Mum made me tea and toast.
When I left for school Mum waved me goodbye. At 8.15a.m Mum got dressed, did the housework and went out to work.
She worked from 10.00a.m until 3.00p.m in a nursery in town. She has a sandwich for dinner at 12.00p.m.
